commands.name: az vmware vm list
commands.summary: List of virtual machines in a private cloud cluster.
examples: az vmware vm list --resource-group group1 --private-cloud cloud1 --cluster-name cluster1

commands.name: az vmware vm restrict-movement
commands.summary: Enable or disable DRS-driven VM movement restriction.
commands.syntax:
az vmware vm restrict-movement [--cluster-name]
                               [--ids]
                               [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                               [--private-cloud]
                               [--resource-group]
                               [--restrict-movement {Disabled, Enabled}]
                               [--subscription]
                               [--virtual-machine]
examples: az vmware vm restrict-movement --resource-group group1 --private-cloud cloud1 --cluster-name cluster1 --virtual-machine vm-209 --restrict-movement Enabled

commands.name: az vmware vm show
commands.summary: Get a virtual machine by id in a private cloud cluster.
examples: az vmware vm show --resource-group group1 --private-cloud cloud1 --cluster-name cluster1 --virtual-machine vm-209
